item.description:
We will take a look at some of the details that go into developing a "workable" Trading Plan.

Since this meeting is after-hours, we are free to use the Library's parking lot. Our meeting room is downstairs and to the right (the Peace Dale Room).

Newcomers are certainly welcome, so if you know of others who might be interested in joining us, please refer them to this site or just bring them along to the meeting.

Hope to see you all there!
Ray
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be the guy operating the laptop and projector.
item.why:
This group is composed of Traders/Investors looking for ways to minimize risk and improve profitability. Our goal is to achieve that through education.
We do NOT make contributions to a pool and invest that money as a group.

group.name: The Charlestown Investor's Business Daily Forum

item.name: Trading Plan Details
